turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: You think I should hang around more with the crew?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Well, I always heard you don't "learn" leadership, you earn it.  How did you know they'd get into the vodka?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: I guess I figured if I was in their shoes that's what I would've done.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Maybe you're more one of us than you think...sir.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: What can we do?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Our only chance is to lure it to the Swamp and flush it like we did the other.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Shit!  He sent them all.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: The escape bubbles?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: They know, don't they?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Yeah...I think they're just deciding what to do with us.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Maybe they already have.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Seeing how my stock's doing...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: We're on backup air.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: How much time does that give us?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Less than an hour.  It's ruptured an air duct.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Can't we fix it?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: We made it!

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Where's Jones?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: It hit me!  Where are they?!

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: I can't see them!

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: The internal monitors read normal.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Where's Doc?!

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: He's not at his station.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: What about our quota?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: You're only twenty-five tons off quota.  Barring an unforeseen problem you should reach it easily on the last day.  It's just a day off.  You don't have to take it, I just thought it might help.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Something wrong, Cobb?

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Uh..Excuse me sir, it's the air recirculating system, sir...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: What's wrong with it?

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: ...I'd really have to show it to you.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: All right...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Excuse me, sir...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Is this a contract violation, Mr. Cobb?

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: No sir...I just wanted to know if you needed a hand?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Shut up, all of you.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Mr. Beck, the contract states that no body can be disposed of without authorization of---

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: It bit me!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Oh, God, she's out there...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Jones...come with me.  Cobb, you and Doc check the rooms.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Charge set?

turns.speaker: WILLIE'S VOICE
turns.text: Charge set.  Backing off.  C'mon Rover let's get out of here.

turns.speaker: WILLIE'S VOICE
turns.text: I'm going inside.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: What's your air reading?

turns.speaker: WILLIE'S VOICE
turns.text: Twenty minutes...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Twenty minutes!...Who had tank duty?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Wait till you reach thirty- five before you blow your suit...

turns.speaker: WILLIE'S VOICE
turns.text: Roger.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Give me a readout, DeJesus.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Ahhhh!

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: How do you feel, DeJesus?

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Better let the Doc take a look at you, after dinner.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Okay, number 23's full.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Let's get it out of here and bring in a new one.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: I can't tell you much about it, except that none of you show any symptoms.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: And it killed Bo?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: No...she killed herself.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Two hundred and fifty-two tons of Magnesium and 15 tons of Sodium.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Sounds like a good week, Beck. In fact...I put your folder in front of the Vice President of District Operations last night...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Thank you, Martin.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Don't thank me, yet, but it is important to know where you're going and who your friends are... 'Know what I mean?

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: ...as long as you know it's not in your contract.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: I know that.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Well, suit yourself, then...its your decision...  Ha ha...a little joke...suit yourself...

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: How's the weather for pickup tomorrow?

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Beautiful.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Well, according to Maritime law, you, as commander of the Shack have the authority to dispose of the body.  However, the company doesn't want you to do that.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: What you don't understand is that my crew is in jeopardy.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: But you don't have any proof at this point to assume that this disease is contagious, do you?

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: I'm not anxious to find out, either.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Beck, trust me.  If the company felt that you or your crew were in any danger we would authorize an immediate emergency pickup. We could be there in a few hours.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Do it.

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Unfortunately.  We can't.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: What're you saying?  That we're not even going to be picked up tomorrow?

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: It shouldn't be a long delay.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: But it's a delay!  How long? A day?  Two days?!

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: Twelve hours, no big deal.  We should know something first thing in the morning.  Don't worry.

turns.speaker: BECK
turns.text: Forty-eight hours!

turns.speaker: MARTIN
turns.text: I realize you must have gone through hell--

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Made your million, yet?

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: Not yet.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: How's TransOcean doing?

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: You got money in this tub?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: I signed-up for the stock option.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: You take your money, too seriously, Bo.

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: You're damn right I do.  Five years down here and I'll pull in more than 15 topside.  I'm not down here for the fun, I'll tell you that.

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: Personal effects...

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Timex...

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: I'm telling you, it's the suits!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Fuck the suits, it's the people monitoring them.  It Doc had been there like he's supposed to it never would've happened!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Hey, Bo...when're you going to be off that thing?  I want to find out tonight's NBA scores and check the weather.

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: The weather's good, I already checked, but I'll be off in a minute.

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: If he had his blinkers on--

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: It wouldn't make any difference in there...He could be two feet away and on fire and she'd still not see him!

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: Who else...Sixpack.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: The man is unbelievable... I say, leave him in there.

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: What about his suit?  That's a million five the company's got to replace.  They'll make somebody go get it.

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: Cute, DeJesus...Specimen cups?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Aw, loosen up, Bowman...  Hey, Willie, I got one served up for you.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Yes sir...

turns.speaker: BOWMAN
turns.text: Hook's on 24...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: What the?...

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Russian.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: You read Russian?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Russian, French, Italian, Spanish, Greek, German, a little Hindu, some Serbo Croat and a smattering of Swahili...standard pre-med background...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Bullshit.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: ...and a Russian grandmother...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: What happened?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: It...almost got you.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: What was it?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Still bothering you?

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Itches like hell.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Take it off and let me have a look.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: No way, Mister Beck!  <u>No</u> <u>fucking way</u>!  We just did a full shift, you can't call Shack duty on top of a full shift.  It's a contract violation!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Whooo!  Right on, Cobb!  Let's hear it for our shop Steward!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Listen to it for Christsake.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Ah, it's just old, like me. You don't see the Doc opening me up every time I get a new creak in my joints...I say, as long as it's recycling the air let the next shift deal with it. But, 'long as we're here...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: So that's all you do?...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Shhhh...don't tell no one.  Job security.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Oooooh.  Damn!  Not so loud. Turn down the music.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: What music?  There ain't no music.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Yeah?  How'd the kid hold up?

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Pretty good.  He sent them out videotaping outcrop.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: "Routine," my ass!  Ain't nothin' "routine" about no physical check- up 10,000 feet down...especially when we're getting picked up the next day!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: He didn't say it was a "routine check-up," he said it was a "routine <u>precaution</u>."

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: At least we get time and a half.  That's in the contract.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Fuck double pay, man!  I want out of here!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: What's going on?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: It's Hazy...It's got him! Stay here and don't let him out.  I'm going to get the Doc.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: You let him get away!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: I ain't doing nothing for that thing without something to defend myself.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: That <u>thing</u> happens to be my friend.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: I say we should go get in the escape bubbles and get the hell out of here!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: And hit the surface in the middle of a typhoon?...No, thank you. I'll take my chance down here.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Hey, man, you know that in Switzerland--and this country's the size of East L.A., okay?--they speak 54 different dialects? Fifty-four!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Who cares?

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: I do, man.  That's a beautiful place.  When I get out of here I'm going there.  Find a nice little snow covered chalet, warm little woman, crackling fire--

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Hey, Cobb...Man, why don't you take off your shirt and pants, man?  You should do that wearing what you're going to wear at the beach.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: This is what I wear at the beach, goddamnit.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: You guys are crazy.  What the hell you play that stupid game for?

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: What game, Cobb?...I'm on my way to Nirvana...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: You're on your way somewhere all right...the looney bin.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: I'm on the way to the looney bin?  Hey, man, I'm not the dude sun bathing in his clothes.

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: Bad as he is there's no way we can make our quota with- out his sad self out there. You just can't do it.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: He's tanking on us...

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: C'mon, Cobb...you're slacking...

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: I ain't, goddamnit...It's Jones!..

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Hey!...I feel something. It's moving!  He's alive!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: I feel it, too...Someone's trying to get out.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: It's Sixpack!

turns.speaker: COBB
turns.text: I'm going to kill it!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Burritos...Enchiladas...

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Oh, gag, man, how can you eat that stuff?...

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Typhoon?!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Twelve hours!

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Serves his ass right to get it.  Motherfucker brings that shit onboard.  I hope his fucking ass rots in the sea and is shit upon by the fish.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: 'Fucker could have gotten us all killed.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: How'd you do that?

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: What?  That?...I've done this one before.  You hungry?  I'm hungry.

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Getting some food.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Under there?

turns.speaker: DEJESUS
turns.text: Look.  Water.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Probably the plumbing.  You gonna make me finish that puzzle by myself, or what?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: How far away is she?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: Two hundred meters.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Excuse me, sir...Bowman's sick.  She's downstairs in the infirmary.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: The infirmary?...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Yes sir, ain't that where we usually go when we're sick?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: We're simply concerned about her...proximity to...

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: We've got to get him to the infirmary.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: What are you going to do to him?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: I'm going to try to remove it.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: I've got Cobbie downstairs watching the door.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Bigger than DeJesus?  How?

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: It's had a meal.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: It would explain the suction- like appendages.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Like a leech.

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: The monster appears to be a genetic aberration...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: No fuckin' lie...

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: ...It has many traits of deep sea marine life...regeneration, scales, gills, even a period of dormancy...  but the fact that it remembered where the plasma was stored, or where the communication wiring was, may imply that it has some other quality...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Fuck semantics, Doc! You saying its like part DeJesus, part Sixpack, part Bowman?!

turns.speaker: DOC
turns.text: I don't know.  I'm guessing.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Clear for pickup.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Let's hope it holds.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Hey, Jonesy, who's the best power forward in the NBA...Jameson?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Jameson?  Who're you trying to con?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: "Debbie Does Dallas"...  Hell, it's in Russian.  I can't read it...

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: No...he's really sick.  I heard him last night.  The company will take that into consideration...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Honey, the company don't give a flying fuck about "whys," they just look at the numbers and the contract says if we miss our quota they only got to pay us half-pay for the entire month.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Who were you talking to?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Sixpack...

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: How is he?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Sleeping.  No sign of Doc, though.  I'll check the control room.  You look in the shower room...

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: What on earth's the matter with you?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: I ought to smack your face!

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: What's wrong?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: DeJesus...It's got him.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: It needs blood?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Fucking great...You telling me we got a fucking dracula in here with us?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Cobb's cut...It was in him! It got Doc...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Oh man, that's just great...

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: The good doctor signed our death warrant.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: The air's stopped.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: The shack...

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: She's wondering what's happening.  We're losing air faster than I thought.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Don't spend all day down there.

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Don't fuckin' worry, I ain't.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Are you sure you saw something?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: How many times I got to tell you.  I saw a ship.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Well, why haven't they answered our flares?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Are you okay, Jonesy?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Tip top, Willie...tip top.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Who's the best power forward in the NBA...Jameson?

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Jameson?  Who are you trying to con...?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: It saw us!

turns.speaker: JONES
turns.text: Answer them and quit kicking me!

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: I'm not touching you!

turns.speaker: SIXPACK
turns.text: My pocket.  Check my pocket, will ya, honey?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Your pocket?

turns.speaker: SIXPACK
turns.text: The latch is screwed up.  Or the hinge.

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: SIXPACK
turns.text: Bitch!  Look what you did!

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Sorry, darling...Just thought a little humor would loosen us all up...you know?...

turns.speaker: SIXPACK
turns.text: What's wrong, did you miss me?

turns.speaker: WILLIE
turns.text: Hardly.

turns.speaker: SIXPACK
turns.text: Don't worry, darlin, I'm...

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: Soap is called Soap because he likes to keep his hands clean of any unlawful behaviour. He is proud of his job, and even more proud that it's legal.

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: He's a stroppy sod but he's got more balls than a golfer, only he doesn't know it. ' * Cut from completed film.

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: I'll kill him!

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: Stop fucking around, Tom, and think. What are we going to do?

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: So how long do you have to wait 'till you see a return?

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: Probably no longer than four weeks.

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: A month? So, my friend, what fucking good is that, if we need it in six . . . no, five days?

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: Well, it's still a good idea.

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: How much did you part with?

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: Seven hundred for the pair.

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: Is there something we should know about you, Soap?

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: I am not sure what's more worrying, the job or your past.

turns.speaker: TOM
turns.text: A what?

turns.speaker: BACON
turns.text: A traffic warden. Look, what's this?
